Package controllerGui

Class PersonalMessagesController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllerGui.PersonalMessagesController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IScreen
    public class PersonalMessagesController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IScreen
    Personal messages area GUI controller, implements Screen interface Getting and showing user's messages from all times. SMS & Mail also (as simulation)
    Author:
    Lidor

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This method is used to initialize the components of the view and set up the message table. It requests the personal messages, sets up the table and sets wrapping property of message label to true.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface IScreen
